tosdr.case: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

title: Users agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
quoteText: We explicitly honor diversity in age, gender, gender identity or expression, culture, ethnicity, language, national origin, political beliefs, profession, race, religion, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, and technical ability. We will not tolerate discrimination based on any of the protected characteristics above, including participants with disabilities.
